casebody.data:
No. 583.

Gilliland Oil Company v. State of Arkansas ex rel. H. W. Applegate, Attorney General. Submitted April 25, 1927. Decided May 2, 1927. Mr. G. W. Hendricks for plaintiff in error. Messrs.. J. S. Utley, H. W. Applegate, and William T. Hammock for defendant in error. Per Curiam.

Affirmed on the authority of Roberts & Schaefer Co. v. Emmerson, 271 U. S. 50; St. Louis Southwestern Ry. Co. v. Arkansas, 235 U. S. 350; Harris v. Bell, 254 U. S. 103.
